title: Alex Palou: 'McLaren contract was based on lies – I’ll be paying for years'
summary: Alex Palou has dominated IndyCar racing in recent seasons but claims that he's not even among the series' highest-earners as a result of McLaren's $20.7m case against him

qa_pairs.question: Which racing series has Alex Palou dominated in recent seasons?
What was the legal case amount that McLaren filed against Alex Palou?
What issue does Alex Palou claim affects his earnings in IndyCar?
